mapper.insert: insert into final_cht(cht_serial, cht_mid, cht_oid, cht_txt, cht_date) values(final_cht_seq.nextval, #{cht_mid}, #{cht_oid}, #{cht_txt}, sysdate)

insert into final_userlist(serial, mid, oid, status, enter_time, gname) values(final_userlist_seq.nextval, #{mid}, #{oid}, #{status}, sysdate, (select air_gname from final_onAir where air_mid=#{oid}))
